title: Polarity and correct connections
fullText:
Polarity testing shall be performed to the extent that is reasonably practicable, with any significant omission being reported. Testing is intended to confirm correct connections, polarity and phase rotation of socket-outlets.
NOTE 1 Testing polarity of consumer mains interruption of supply to the installation.
NOTE 2 Polarity testing of energized sockets cannot detect neutral/earth transpositions. However, this is not required by this clause.
